name: officedev-microsoft-teams-samples-graph-rsc-nodeJs
title: Resource Specific Consent with Graph API Javascript
shortDescription: This sample application demonstrates how to request Resource Specific Consent (RSC) permissions to call Microsoft Graph and enumerate permission grants through a Teams tab
longDescription: This sample app showcases the implementation of Resource Specific Consent (RSC) to access Microsoft Graph APIs, allowing users to manage permission grants through a Teams tab. It features tab integration, RSC permissions, and user interaction for enhanced app functionality.

thumbnails.alt: Solution UX showing resource specific consent with graph api javascript

references.name: Teams development videos from the community
